articles.title: DPRK FM Delegation Leaves for Russia
articles.content:
DPRK FM Delegation Leaves for Russia
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the DPRK Foreign Ministry led by Vice-Minister Kung Sok Ung left here today to visit Russia.

articles.title: January 15th of Lunar Calendar, Folk Holiday
articles.content:
January 15th of Lunar Calendar, Folk Holiday
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Korean people have celebrated the January 15th of the lunar calendar as a holiday from ancient times.
					 According to old records, it began to be observed as a holiday in the period of the three kingdoms.
					
					 Usually they celebrated the holiday from the January 14th of the lunar calendar.  
					
					 The holiday's typical amusements are standing poles with grain stalks on the 14th and enjoying the first full moon on the 15th to wish for everything going well that year.
					
					 Kite-flying, toy pinwheel, tug of war and other folk games and amusements also give a zest to the holiday.
					
					 Holiday dishes are boiled rice admixed with four other staple cereals, sweet rice, dishes made of nine kinds of dried edible herbs and other tasty and nutritive food good for health.

articles.title: Meeting of Great Significance in Establishing Juche
articles.content:
Meeting of Great Significance in Establishing Juche
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Nanhutou meeting held from February 27 to March 3, Juche 25 (1936) marked a historical event in fully establishing Juche for the first time in the Korean revolution and the history of the anti-Japanese national liberation struggle.
					 At that time, the revolutionary force of Korea was already built up and the general situation was developing in favor of the Korean people's anti-Japanese struggle with the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) growing stronger in political and military way and the mass foundation of the revolution expanding considerably.
					
					 Penetrating deep into the requirements of the developing revolution, President Kim Il Sung convened the meeting of military and political cadres of the KPRA in Nanhutou and delivered a report "The Tasks of Communists in the Strengthening and Development of the Anti-Japanese National Liberation Struggle."
					
					 In the report, the President set forth a policy of advancing the main force of the KPRA to the border area and Mt. Paektu area and gradually extending the armed struggle to the homeland for the purpose of escalating the anti-Japanese national liberation struggle.
					
					 He also put forward new strategic policies of forming a permanent united front body and effecting an upsurge in the overall Korean revolution centering on the anti-Japanese armed struggle in order to put the movement of the anti-Japanese national united front on a new stage.
					
					 Reflected in the policies are his steadfast independent stand and patriotic spirit of accomplishing the Korean revolution in a responsible manner and his strong will to liberate the country with the effort of the Korean people by uniting all the anti-Japanese patriotic forces.
					
					 The Juche-based policies made it possible for the Korean people to subdue the Japanese imperialists. They also defeated the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being "the strongest" in the world and turned the country into a powerful nation independent, self-sufficient and self-reliant in defence by successfully carrying out two stages of social revolution, two times of rehabilitation and construction and different stages of socialist construction.
					
					 In particular, the DPRK advanced triumphantly along the road of socialism in the face of manifold trials and challenges in the latter half of the 20th century when the U.S. imperialists were intensifying anti-DPRK moves as never before. All the successes are the fruition of the independent stand that the Korean people regard as their life and soul. 
					
					 The Korean people are now pushing ahead with the building of a thriving nation under the banner of Juche.

articles.title: WHO Assistant Director-general Praised DPRK's Healthcare
articles.content:
WHO Assistant Director-general Praised DPRK's Healthcare
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Eric Laroche, assistant director-general of the World Health Organization, on a visit to the DPRK was interviewed by a KCNA reporter on Friday.
					He said he was impressed by the advantageous socialist healthcare system in the DPRK wisely led by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Every Korean benefits from free medical care, he said, and went on:
					
					 There is a well-regulated healthcare system from the capital city to local areas.
					
					 Doctors call on sick people in the DPRK. 
					
					 The state takes care of medical service in the DPRK.
					
					 The Korean people enjoy a happy life under the advantageous healthcare system. 
					
					  I was impressed to witness the reality of the DPRK where an excellent health policy is in force.
					
					 Health institutions are providing medical service by dint of highly developed Koryo medicine. This is greatly contributing to the promotion of people's health.
					
					 Channeling efforts into the prophylactic treatment, the DPRK is meeting its need for varieties of medical equipment and efficacious medicines with those manufactured at home.

articles.title: All Agricultural Workers Called upon to Bring Bumper Harvest
articles.content:
All Agricultural Workers Called upon to Bring Bumper Harvest
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The recent national meeting of agricultural workers was a significant one as it demonstrated the fixed faith of all the agricultural workers to take the lead in materializing the plan of the Workers' Party of Korea to build a thriving nation by displaying strong revolutionary enthusiasm and patriotic devotion, say leading newspapers Saturday in their editorials.
					 Rodong Sinmun notes it is the unanimous resolution of all the agricultural workers of the DPRK to boost the grain production so as to devotedly defend the Party and the leader and ensure that uninterrupted greater victory is won in the drive for effecting a great surge. 
					
					 All the agricultural workers should bring about a radical turn in the agricultural production by fully displaying their patriotic devotion and creative enthusiasm holding aloft the slogan "All efforts for implementing the Party's policy of agricultural revolution!" and thus bring a rich harvest to every field across the country, it says, and goes on: 
					
					They should resolutely preserve and eternally glorify the immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il performed in the agricultural development of the country and socialist rural construction.
					
					 All the officials and workers in the field of agriculture should radically increase the grain production with a view to realizing the President's lifelong desire and remaining true to the Party's Songun revolutionary leadership. 
					
					 Minju Joson calls on all the officials and workers in the field of agriculture to bring about a bumper harvest by putting spurs to the agricultural production once again in this significant year and thus make a positive contribution to improving the people's standard of living.

articles.title: South Pomminryon Protests Police Suppression
articles.content:
South Pomminryon Protests Police Suppression
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification (Pomminryon) made public a statement on Feb. 24, slashing at the fascist police authorities' crackdown on the organization.
					 The statement disclosed that the Pusan District Police Station searched the Internet homepage of the organization and confiscated its data on the same day.
					
					 Such repressive action was taken after the police failed to crack down upon Chairman Ri Kyu Jae and two members of the South Headquarters of Pomminryon on charges of violation of the "National Security Law" as regards the meeting held in Pusan on Nov. 29 last year to mark the 19th anniversary of the organization, it pointed out.
					
					 It condemned this reckless behavior as a violent deed against reunification, democracy and human rights and as a downright gangster-like action.
					
					 The persistent repression under the pretext of public security will only invite a more vigorous anti-"government" struggle, the statement warned, calling on the people from all walks of life to come out in the struggle to overthrow the dictatorial regime at an early date and realize reunification.

articles.title: S. Korea: Anti-Reunification Action Flayed
articles.content:
S. Korea: Anti-Reunification Action Flayed
						
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- The Media Headquarters of the South Side Committee for Implementing June 15 Joint Declaration released a statement on Feb. 24, blasting the puppet Ministry of Unification for hindering the inter-Korean exchange.
					 The statement recalled that on Feb. 23 the "ministry" did not grant the application, made by the headquarters for working contact with the press organization in the north, on the pretext of "security", "maintenance of order" and the like.
					
					 This is an anti-reunification action intended to completely hold in check the inter-Korean non-governmental contact and exchange, it charged.
					
					 It urged the authorities to dismiss Hyon In Thaek from the post of the "minister of Unification" at once and resume the inter-Korean exchange.

articles.title: Crime-woven Two Years of South "Government" Censured
articles.content:
Crime-woven Two Years of South "Government" Censured
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Members of civic and public organizations in south Korea, including the Solidarity for Implementing the South-North Joint Declaration, called a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 24 at which they disclosed the record of crimes committed by the puppet authorities in two years since they came to power.
					 Speakers at the conference recalled that organizations of different circles have conducted the signature campaign for punishing the present "government" from Dec. 8 last year.
					
					 They noted that broad strata of people participated in the signature campaign to lay bare the crimes of the present authorities engaged in the traitorous rule and demand a stern punishment of them.
					
					 Then a press release was read out there. It branded the last two years under the present "government" as the period during which democracy was stamped out and dictatorship revived, the common people were driven out to wander about streets for one percent of plutocrats and the confrontation and tension between the south and the north were escalated while the June 15 joint declaration was denied.
					
					 The release expressed the resolution to sternly punish on behalf of the population the present "government" pursuing the policy against democracy and reunification.
					
					 The Headquarters of the People's Movement for Reviving the South-North Economic Cooperation, the Citizen's Solidarity for Peaceful Reunification and other civic and public organizations, too, held a meeting in Seoul on Feb. 23 at which they condemned the two years since the emergence of the present "government" as the days when the inter-Korean cooperation and exchange have been checked due to its policy of sycophancy towards the U.S. and confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 On the same day professors of universities in south Korea published a white paper on the crimes perpetrated by the present puppet authorities during the two years of their office.

articles.title: Honorary Title from Oaxaca State, Mexico
articles.content:
Honorary Title from Oaxaca State, Mexico
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with the honorary title of "Outstanding Friend" by Oaxaca State of Mexico.
					 An event of conveying the diploma of the title took place in the state on Feb. 10.
					
					 The diploma was handed over to an official concerned of the DPRK active in this country.
					
					 Written on it are letters reading: "The government of Oaxaca State presents the honorary title of 'Outstanding Friend' to HE Kim Jong Il, chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission, in high recognition of his feats for independence and peace of mankind and for the development of the friendly relations between the Mexican and Korean peoples. With best regards. Master Ulises Luis Ortiz, governor of Oaxaca State. February 16, 2010, Oaxaca State, Mexico."

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked in Various Countries
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Marked in Various Countries
Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- Meetings, book and photo exhibitions, film shows and receptions took place in Thailand, Malta and Ecuador, Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibitions in Mexico, Brazil and Bulgaria and film shows in Indonesia, Laos, Malaysia, Myanmar, Ukraine and Syria between Feb. 5 and 25 to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 On display in the venues of the events were works of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and photos on their immortal exploits, books and photos on the Korean people in their efforts to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and handicrafts associated with wisdom and talents of the Korean nation.
					
					 Appreciated at the film shows were "The Tower of the Juche Idea", "Reply of Korea" and other Korean films.
					
					 Speeches were made at the events.
					
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the C.C., the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, praised Kim Jong Il as the great brilliant commander of Songun and the peerless statesman who turned the DPRK into an invincible power under the uplifted banner of Songun.
					
					 Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, said that the Korean book, photo and handicraft exhibition provides a good opportunity for the Brazilian people to learn from the indomitable heroic spirit and work style of the Korean people.
					
					 Songchit Pullarp, chairman of the Organization for the Study of the Juche Idea of Thailand, noted that Kim Jong Il has further developed and enriched the Juche idea, founded by Kim Il Sung, through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and performed the undying feats in building a thriving nation with his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The international secretary of the C.C., the Communist Party of Malta stressed that Kim Jong Il is the lodestar of the nation as he has devotedly worked for the independent and peaceful reunification of the country, true to the behests of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 A message of greetings to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the event in Thailand.

articles.title: Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Germany
articles.content:
Day of Sun to Be Commemorated in Germany
 Pyongyang, February 27 (KCNA) -- A German preparatory committee for commemorating the Day of the Sun was inaugurated in Berlin on Feb. 6.
					 The chairperson of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Germany was elected chairperson of the preparatory committee.
					
					The committee decided to introduce the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il through media and hold colorful political and cultural events on the occasion of the Day of the Sun.

articles.title: Mexico: otorgan a Kim Jong Il titulo honorifico
articles.content:
Mexico: otorgan a Kim Jong Il titulo honorifico 
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio el titulo honorifico de "Amigo Extraordinario" que le concediera el Estado de Oaxaca de Mexico.
					  El acto de entrega del titulo tuvo lugar el dia 10 en ese estado mexicano.
					
					  En la ocasion fue trasladado el certificado a un funcionario coreano que trabaja en Mexico.
					
					En el certificado se lee que el gobierno de Oaxaca dedica ese titulo honorifico a Su Excelencia       Kim Jong Il, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, en reconocimiento de sus proezas realizadas por la causa de la humanidad para la independencia y la paz y por el desarrollo de las relaciones de amistad entre el pueblo mexicano y el coreano.

articles.title: Eric Laroche elogia sistema de salud publica de la RPDC
articles.content:
Eric Laroche elogia sistema de salud publica de la RPDC 
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ATCC) -- Eric Laroche, director general asistente de la Organizacion Mundial de la Salud (OMS), de visita en Corea, se entrevisto el dia 26 con la Agencia Telegrafica Central de Corea.
					  Muy emocionado del ventajoso sistema de salud publica socialista de Corea bajo la sabia guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, dijo que todo el pueblo coreano se beneficia de ese sistema gratuito, y continuo:
					
					  En Corea se ha establecido el ordenado sistema de salud publica desde en la capital hasta en las localidades.
					
					  Ademas, el medico acude a los pacientes y el Estado se responsabiliza de los servicios medicos.
					
					  El pueblo coreano vive felizmente bajo el ventajoso sistema sanitario.
					
					  Me quede conmovido al presenciar la realidad de Corea donde se practica la excelente politica sanitaria.
					
					  Los organos de asistencia medica ofrecen sus servicios aplicando la avanzada medicina Coryo (medicina tradicional), que contribuye mucho al fomento de salud de los habitantes.
					
					  Igualmente, Corea presta mucha atencion al tratamiento profilactico y cubre las demandas con los equipos medicos de varios tipos y las medicinas eficientes fabricados por cuenta propia.

articles.title: 15 de enero del calendario lunar - fiesta folclorica de Corea
articles.content:
15 de enero del calendario lunar - fiesta folclorica de Corea
						
  Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ATCC) -- El 15 de enero segun el calendario lunar es la fiesta tradicional de Corea con larga historia.
					 Segun registros historicos, esa efemeride comenzo a celebrarse desde la epoca de los Tres Reinos.
					
					 Esta fiesta empieza generalmente un dia antes, o sea, el 14 de enero lunar.
					
					 Entre las actividades representativas figuran el levantamiento de los palos sostenedores de hacinas que se efectua el 14 de enero y la contemplacion de la luna llena que se hace el 15 de enero por la noche deseando que todo vaya bien ese ano.
					
					 Ademas, se entablan los juegos folcloricos como la voladura de cometa, el molinete, la lucha de cuerda, etc.
					
					 Las comidas tipicas de ese dia son el arroz hecho con 5 cereales sabrosos y nutritivos, el arroz medicinal que previene la enfermedad y mejora la salud, la ensalada de 9 plantas comestibles que incrementan la resistencia al calor durante el ano, etc.
					
					 Esta fiesta folclorica se celebra mas animadamente cada ano gracias al patriotismo del pueblo coreano que aprecia mucho su nacionalidad.

articles.title: surcoreana denuncia represion de policia titere
articles.content:
Entidad surcoreana denuncia represion de policia titere
						
Pyongyang, 27 de febrero (ATCC) -- La Direccion Surena de la Alianza Pannacional por la Reunificacion de la Patria (APRP) hizo publica el dia 24 una declaracion para condenar la represion de las autoridades de policia fascista contra su entidad.
					El documento revela que el mismo dia, la oficina de policia local de Pusan confisco y registro la pagina web de Internet de dicha entidad y arrebato los datos.
					
					Denuncia que la policia cometio tal crimen al fracasar su proposito tendente a reprimir al presidente Ri Kyu Jae y otros 2 miembros de la Direccion Surena de la APRP en virtud de la "ley de la seguridad" relacionandolos con el mitin por el aniversario 19 de la constitucion de dicha entidad, efectuado el 29 de noviembre del ano pasado en Pusan.
					
					Califica tal locura de la policia fascista del despotismo contra la reunificacion, la democracia y los derechos humanos y del acto completamente bandidesco.
					
					Diciendo que cuanto mas continua la represion policiaca contra la seguridad publica tanto mas energicamente librara la lucha antigubernamental, el documento exhorta a todos los estratos de habitantes a levantarse en la lucha por poner fin cuanto antes al "poder" dictatorial y lograr la reunificacion.
